comment: по клику на плотно лежащие трупы убитых гранатой гражданских

languages.text: Кто-то закинул фраг-гранату прямо в плотную толпу, и осколки устроили настоящую мясорубку.
Someone tossed a frag grenade right into the thick of the crowd, where shrapnel caused true carnage.
languages.original_text: Кто-то закинул фраг-гранату прямо в плотную толпу, и осколки устроили настоящую мясорубку.

traits.locale_text: Someone tossed a frag grenade right into the thick of the crowd, and the shrapnel caused incredible carnage.
Someone tossed a frag grenade right into the thick of the crowd, and the shrapnel caused incredible carnage.
Someone tossed a frag grenade right into the thick of the crowd, where shrapnel caused a true carnage.
Someone tossed a frag grenade right into the thick of the crowd, where shrapnel caused a true carnage.
Someone tossed a frag grenade right into the thick of the crowd, where shrapnel caused true carnage.
Someone tossed a frag grenade right into the thick of the crowd, where shrapnel caused true carnage.

languages.text: Jemand hat eine Fragmentgranate mitten in die Menge geworfen, wo das Schrapnell ein echtes Blutbad angerichtet hat.
languages.original_text: Someone tossed a frag grenade right into the thick of the crowd, where shrapnel caused true carnage.

traits.locale_text: Jemand hat eine Fragmentgranate mitten in die Menge geworfen, wo das Schrapnell ein echtes Blutbad angerichtet hat.

languages.text: Quelqu'un a lancé une grenade à fragmentation en pleine foule... Les éclats ont fait un véritable carnage.
languages.original_text: Someone tossed a frag grenade right into the thick of the crowd, where shrapnel caused true carnage.

traits.locale_text: Quelqu'un a lancé une grenade à fragmentation en pleine foule... Les éclats ont fait un véritable carnage.

languages.text: 有人朝人群里扔了一枚破片手雷，四射的弹片造成了大量伤亡。
languages.original_text: Someone tossed a frag grenade right into the thick of the crowd, where shrapnel caused true carnage.

traits.locale_text: 有人朝人群里扔了一枚破片手雷，四射的弹片造成了大量伤亡。

languages.text: 何者かが大勢の群衆の中にフラググレネードを投げ入れ、榴散弾が大サイン時を引き起こした。
languages.original_text: Someone tossed a frag grenade right into the thick of the crowd, where shrapnel caused true carnage.

traits.locale_text: 何者かが大勢の群衆の中にフラググレネードを投げて、榴散弾で本当の大虐殺が起きてしまった。

languages.text: Alguien lanzó una granada frag en medio de la multitud, donde la metralla causó una verdadera carnicería.
languages.original_text: Someone tossed a frag grenade right into the thick of the crowd, where shrapnel caused true carnage.

traits.locale_text: Alguien lanzó una granada frag en medio de la multitud, donde la metralla causó una verdadera carnicería.

languages.text: Birisi, kalabalığın tam ortasına parça tesrili bomba atmış. Saçılan şarapneller tam bir katliama yol açmış.
languages.original_text: Someone tossed a frag grenade right into the thick of the crowd, where shrapnel caused true carnage.

traits.locale_text: Birisi, kalabalığın tam ortasına el bombası atmış. Asıl katliama sebep olansa şarapnel parçaları olmuş.
